channel.title: Lint Filter on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Lint Filter on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Lint, Filtered
item.description: Today in Tedium: Of the many appliances in our home that create byproducts, is there a more interesting byproduct than dryer lint? I don’t ask this to be facetious, nor to overplay its value, but to point out that there’s something inherently interesting about lint. It looks fluffy. It feels weird in your hands. And while it’s somewhat annoying to get rid of (and yes, you should get rid of it), it nonetheless is a novel object, one that’s more interesting and less disgusting than navel lint could ever claim to be.
